==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* The word "chrysalis" broadly refers to insect pupa,<ref>Merriam-Webster: [https://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/chrysalis chrysalis]</ref> and usually refers specifically to that of moths and butterflies.<ref>Cambridge: [https://dictionary.cambridge.org/us/dictionary/english/chrysalis chrysalis]</ref>
* "Suspirii" is the genitive singular of "suspirium," meaning "a deep breath" or "sigh."<ref>Wiktionary: [https://en.m.wiktionary.org/wiki/suspirium suspirium]</ref>
